meanings.definition: To appear or become real or actual.
meanings.sent1: The magic trick materialized a rabbit out of thin air.
meanings.sent2: The dream of becoming a doctor materialized after years of hard work.
meanings.sent3: The cake materialized in the oven, but it was actually a hat in disguise!
meanings.sent4: Her fears materialized into a giant monster in her nightmares.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship materialized in a flash of light, stunning the onlookers.

meanings.definition: To take on a physical form or substance.
meanings.sent1: The ghost materialized in front of the scared children.
meanings.sent2: The fog materialized into a dense wall, blocking the view.
meanings.sent3: The missing sock materialized in the laundry basket, right where it belonged.
meanings.sent4: His anger materialized as a storm cloud above his head.
meanings.sent5: The potion materialized into a shimmering golden key, unlocking the hidden door.
